## Project Overview
This is a Python workspace for X-ray reflectometry (XRR) fitting with comprehensive data analysis capabilities including:
- Multilayer stack modeling using Parratt recursion
- Nevot-Croce roughness correction
- Parameter fitting with scipy optimization
- Uncertainty quantification with MCMC sampling
